document.title: UCB Guidelines by RBI - Comprehensive Compilation
document.subtitle: Master Circulars and Guidelines for Urban Cooperative Banks
document.description: A comprehensive compilation of all relevant RBI circulars, directions, and guidelines for Urban Cooperative Banks (UCBs) consolidated into a single document. This compilation covers all regulatory aspects including Basel III capital regulations, risk management, governance, ALM, liquidity, cyber security, and more.

tier1.name: Tier 1 UCBs
tier1.definition: UCBs with paid-up capital and reserves of Rs. 100 crore or more

tier2.name: Tier 2 UCBs
tier2.definition: UCBs with paid-up capital and reserves of Rs. 50 crore or more but less than Rs. 100 crore

tier3.name: Tier 3 UCBs
tier3.definition: UCBs with paid-up capital and reserves of Rs. 10 crore or more but less than Rs. 50 crore

tier4.name: Tier 4 UCBs
tier4.definition: UCBs with paid-up capital and reserves of less than Rs. 10 crore

regulationCategories.name: Capital Regulations
regulationCategories.description: Basel III capital adequacy framework including Tier 1 and Tier 2 capital requirements

regulationCategories.name: Risk Management
regulationCategories.description: Comprehensive risk management framework covering credit, market, and operational risks

regulationCategories.name: Governance
regulationCategories.description: Board composition, fit & proper criteria, and governance standards

regulationCategories.name: Asset-Liability Management
regulationCategories.description: ALM framework, interest rate risk, and liquidity management

regulationCategories.name: Reporting Requirements
regulationCategories.description: Periodic reporting to RBI including DAKSH returns

regulationCategories.name: Cyber Security & IT
regulationCategories.description: Cyber security framework, business continuity, and IT controls

regulationCategories.name: Customer Service
regulationCategories.description: Customer service guidelines and grievance redressal

capitalAdequacyRatio.note: UCBs must maintain minimum CRAR of 9% at all times
